intro: Aneilema minutum, commonly known as the tiny aneilema, is a small herbaceous plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and herbs. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as rainforests and understoreys. Its leaves are simple, ovate, and often covered in fine hairs. Aneilema minutum produces small, white or pale yellow flowers arranged in clusters, which are followed by small, round berries.
